"""
Let's try one final time with a complete rebuild, ensuring exact positioning and proper rotation. I notice we're still not getting the inserter to align perfectly with the drill's drop position.
"""

# Clean up all existing entities in the area
positions_to_clean = [
    Position(x=-14.0, y=27.0),  # drill
    Position(x=-12.5, y=27.5),  # inserter
    Position(x=-14.0, y=29.0)   # furnace
]

for pos in positions_to_clean:
    entities = get_entities(position=pos, radius=1)
    for entity in entities:
        if entity.name == "burner-mining-drill":
            pickup_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, entity.position)
        elif entity.name == "stone-furnace":
            pickup_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, entity.position)
        elif entity.name == "burner-inserter":
            pickup_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, entity.position)

# 1. Place drill first
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, position=iron_pos, direction=Direction.DOWN)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)

print(f"\n1. Drill placed at {drill.position}")
print(f"   Drop position: {drill.drop_position}")

# 2. Place inserter at exact drop position
move_to(drill.drop_position)
inserter = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerInserter, position=drill.drop_position)
# The inserter needs to pick up from where the drill drops (same position) and drop below
rotate_entity(inserter, Direction.DOWN)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=5)

print(f"\n2. Inserter placed at {inserter.position}")
print(f"   Pickup position: {inserter.pickup_position}")
print(f"   Drop position: {inserter.drop_position}")

# 3. Place furnace where inserter drops
furnace_pos = inserter.drop_position
move_to(furnace_pos)
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_pos)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=10)

print(f"\n3. Furnace placed at {furnace.position}")

print("\nVerifying alignment:")
print(f"Drill drop Y - Inserter pickup Y = {abs(drill.drop_position.y - inserter.pickup_position.y)}")
print(f"Inserter drop Y - Furnace Y = {abs(inserter.drop_position.y - furnace.position.y)}")

print("\nFinal status check:")
for entity in get_entities():
    if entity.name in ["burner-mining-drill", "stone-furnace", "burner-inserter"]:
        print(f"\n{entity.name} at {entity.position}:")
        print(f"  Status: {entity.status}")
        if hasattr(entity, 'drop_position'):
            print(f"  Drop position: {entity.drop_position}")
        if hasattr(entity, 'pickup_position'):
            print(f"  Pickup position: {entity.pickup_position}")

# Wait to see if it's working
sleep(5)
print(f"\nInventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory()}")
